text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]v = \left[ \begin{array}{c} 3 \\ 4 \\ 7 \\ 1 \end{array} \right].[/mathjaxinline] What is the vector [mathjaxinline]w\in \mathbb R^4[/mathjaxinline] that is closest to [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline]?
(You should not need to do any projection calculation!)

font.p: Certainly [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline] itself is the only vector that is distance zero from [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline]!
